name: 2D Shooter (OutstandingBoi)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.  Added all the necessary elements and other changes:

  1. Added level 4;
  2. Adjusted menu;
  3. Enemies counter;
  4. New type of enemy - chasing double shooter;
  5. Added Boss with 200 HP and 3  guns.

Credits:

Created by Anton Belko.
